poem:
"Inside Out: A Cinematic Revelation"

On the silver screen, emotions made grand,
A narrative boldly and brightly danced.
From a girl aged eleven, bridging the world,
A sequel spun, its wonder unfurled.
Swimming past records, not once, twice,
A testament, truly, to creativity's device.
The hearts of millions, silently won,
Pixar's Inside Out, under the bright sun.
